meanings.definition: relating to or affected by metastasis
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the metastatic cancer had spread to other organs.
meanings.sent2: Her metastatic tumor had moved from the original location to her lungs.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous metastatic cell decided to explore beyond its usual boundaries.
meanings.sent4: The rumors in the small town were metastatic, spreading like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The idea of fear was metastatic, growing and consuming her thoughts.

meanings.definition: capable of spreading to other parts of the body
meanings.sent1: The virus was highly metastatic, quickly infecting multiple organs.
meanings.sent2: The metastatic nature of the disease made it challenging to treat.
meanings.sent3: The party was so fun, it felt like a metastatic celebration of joy.
meanings.sent4: His influence was metastatic, reaching far beyond his immediate circle.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire was metastatic, engulfing everything in its path.
